TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IColumnMapping

Docs.summary: Associates a data source column with a column, and is implemented by the class, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping> interface enables an inheriting class to implement a Column Mapping class, which associates a data source column with a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column. For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings).
An application does not create an instance of the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping> interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping>.
Classes that inherit <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping> must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. For example, the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping> interface defines the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping.DataSetColumn%2A> property. In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> class inherits this property, and also defines the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping.GetDataColumnBySchemaAction%2A> method.
## Examples The following example creates an instance of the derived class, <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>, and adds it to a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> collection. It then tells the user that the mapping was added to the collection and shows the parent for the mapping.
[!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

block.para:
When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructors:
Item
Description
ColumnMapping()
Initializes a new instance of the ColumnMapping class.
ColumnMapping(string sourceColumn, string dataSetColumn)
Initializes a new instance of the ColumnMapping class with a source with the specified source column name and column name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSetColumn { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataSetColumn : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the column within the to map to.
Docs.value: The name of the column within the to map to. The name is not case sensitive.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SourceColumn { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SourceColumn : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the column within the data source to map from. The name is case-sensitive.
Docs.value: The case-sensitive name of the column in the data source.

remarks.format:
